Key Match Events: Dallas Mavericks lost 114-113 to the Phoenix Suns on Friday night at home.
Dallas failed to overcome a 13-point half-time deficit.
Jusuf Nurkic made two free throws with 0.8 seconds left in the game, having been fouled on an offensive rebound.
Post-Match Reflections: Dallas Mavericks head coach Jason Kidd spoke calmly but bluntly after his team failed to overcome a 13-point half-time deficit en route to its fourth loss in nine games.
Jason Kidd emphasized the need for more energy from his group from the tip and the bench to help out Luka Doncic and Kyrie Irving.
Jason Kidd criticized the bench, stating that they need to participate more.
